data.title: Strictly for My Streamers
data.meta_description:
Strictly for My Streamers by ytcracker, released 03 May 2017

1. hacker music
2. make it pwn dem
3. droppin hertz on em
4. just cruising
5. terminal
6. computer crime
7. pinot noir superstar
8. one way love
9. second base appeal
10. struck
11. that kid
12. supernova swag
13. welcome to the get along gang
14. hacker wars (v2.0)
15. open your eyes
16. i gotta
17. i'm brave
18. packets
19. crack cocaine
20. bitness
21. doomsday
22. paint
23. still deegee (tz80i remix)
24. paint (dicepticon remix)

btc: 1ytcdgNzF3ygR8faAcFhu3SjoexhmwdAJ

this is just a collection of bsides/singles from the last six years or something that were never on spotify or anything so i decided to just put them up on all of the things.

love you! hack the planet!
ytcracker
rapper@gmail.com
ytcracker.com
twitter.com/realytcracker
facebook.com/ytcracker
data.text:
1.

hacker music 02:48

witness all these big websites on a DGs hitlist upstream fitness connection keep the pingtime healthy quickness is it a wonder that the hackers of the world making front page news across the globe with all our exploits? and they try to lock us up by the truckload fuck no bringing all that truth to the front though casuals in the crosshairs aint a safe place on my internet they can call theirs got a nerd in every datacenter bumping my tunes on the speakers behind NOC floors locked doors CTO in his tesla press the repeat button cause he need a banger to swang to lead dev in the shed with a can of code red trying to write his last line to the same tune come and find me still a soldier in this internet game stay grimy keep the army behind me blind SQLi to my drive where the line be hackers on the net #define me antis on a quest to kill -9 me whitehat warriors choreograph their blasts to match my blackhat psyche hacker music man i code these flows so crews can abuse it hacker music playlist for that late night make the news shit them guccifers and them snowdens streamed UTF-8 encoding all the state sponsored hacking with the backing of an agency man we playing in the major leagues candidates in elections risk that infection from anyone who got the source code of that next gen hypervisor inception cloud burst servers with that burst protection may flex arrest if they catch you home clocking them clicks like a metronome you best bless your phone when that stingray on cause there aint no telling when that thing stay on my squad stay turnt sweep the SDR with a replay attack to straight grease your car we do it all hardware software espace meatspace weaponize the work in our briefcase witness database longer than a camgirls wishlist bout that business bitcoin in the trezor keep crypto christmas is it a wonder that the hackers of the world still banging my music when they penetrate the gibson? even haters recognize a christian slater when im spitting this digital pimping

2.

make it pwn dem 03:33

bitch im from the internet - no manners surfing through the web with my .net spammers rude boy with financial planners shuttering them gibsons like old school cameras doing damage got a rootkit set to download all the things on your laptop like a slap chop slice up the game from a virtualbox snapshot i think not i can pwn them from an internet cafe i got five proxies and lots of 0day call me chakotay im a commander (you dont say)? i been running voyages whodi truecrypt on the train backtrack on the plane stealing all these passwords mayne gogo inflight tunnel into amazon dont pay a thing just like it was my carryon i make it pwn them from their own cable modem then i showed em just how a spaceman get down track everything in ableton then mix down fly it out to internets and file it under hit sound i been around three decades aint getting any younger so bitches better hit play but ive refined ive sharpened my skills with the whetstone of internet and pharmaceutical pills no matter how many distros of linux come rolling out with patches im still gonna finish slash root off like it was a game of quidditch cuz i got shells in the mean time like greenwich im a dentist extract files like a molar problems with my self control im bipolar hack the planet man's what im screaming all up in mysql daemon net dreaming

3.

droppin hertz on em 04:02

mic damager whodi who still spamming ya hemorrhage brain stems with memorable space jams i don't give a damn bout how them antis be speaking i got a campaign in the hopper and i'm blasting all weekend i got that fri-day mentality not rebecca black but ice to the third power and like a whiskey and sour you can find me in the mix more often than not cuz my beats knock i got that wub wub wobble and i like the filthy filthy shit yes it's hard to swallow that my following on twitter got combined IQ of a hundred million billion cuz we're smarter than you we got that nerd flu - we sick with the hustle while we built on computers yes you might've built your muscle but we built the internet and telephone networks dg pull your doc like threads on a sweatshirt dropping hertz on em bitch i got gigs in the bag dropping hertz on em give em nerd life fly the flag dropping hertz on em listen to me newbie dont laugh i do math motherfucker do the math motherfucker x2 i dont want to ffucking asdo apaopadsstroapeuhes anymorea OHAHISHDSKJasam most the people that decipher my lyrics we kin spirits cuz we obviously share the same interests so go pimp this in your whip or cage TEMPEST michael faraday narrative cant resist these nerdy genes i inherited "yea you best secure your password" the last words that you heard before we rooted ya son im under tutelage of one the Spam God - Praise get up on the Internet and show me your ways i havent slept in days bawls and vault bottles on the floor littering the path to the office door (tell me more) got a jailbreak on the sly from coders at dev-team iOS show a pwnapple up on that load screen im a living dream - im living proof that it works to put the word hertz in a song and move it along without the slightest bit of pain connotated at all well maybe just a little bit i dont want to look too soft there really aren't lyrics here but you might be reading this thinking these are the lyrics but i am just saying hello because i am very scientific i am organic matter thank you very much holler sir baby take it off - change your permissions a bit get an array made of legs if i run a quick split() youd be surprised at how that pick up line does at the bars in silicon valley with them nerd rock stars dropping hertz on em bitch i got gigs in the bag dropping hertz on em give em nerd life fly the flag dropping hertz on em listen to me newbie dont laugh i do math motherfucker do the math motherfucker x3

4.

just cruising 04:34

just a pilot in his cockpit seated (seated) black leather on his ass keep a hustler heated (heated) wheels engaging the pavement rubber escorts like im seeking arrangement (rangement) push the gas - escalate the gauges escalate hits on our camgirls pages blaze it and hit em with a script full of sexy phrases (phrases) slow down and turn the corner we been cornering the game since the five and quarter represent that nerd world order replacing all the brick and mortar (mortar) sending mails off an auto forwarder from a girl in florida with a case of boredom and you cant ignore em cuz the filters weak into the inbox they all creep while you sleep (sleep) flying by street lamps straight LAMP install complete by the freelance holding down the game like c clamps blowing out the smoke from these green plants switch lanes breaking all these busters brains trying to keep us out of their customers names emails and passwords so disastrous when my clique get a hold of those easy hashes just cruising (cruising) and my crew put our dues in while yall snoozing just cruising (cruising) hard drive live with a fresh solution just cruising (cruising) and my crew put our dues in while yall snoozing just cruising (cruising) driving that digital distribution down shift transmission hold the shift key down get capital printing bills like clinton using message composition defeating certificate pinning im winning - hella threads on my progs and linen got a dictionary file for my domain spinning im hacking the world for profit (profit) aint a thing you can do to stop it (stop it) flick my blinker in the blink of an eye my pointer finger clicking start on my auto linker spraying up the internet like a sprinkler no droughts the rayns included and im sending off a dedicated that i rooted some say the games diluted but were so far ahead of the game we race through it enable the brights yea the future ahead look mighty nice no obstacles no red lights hit reverse on the apps on my device getting rebills from a chat prog ask how we do it i could show you a chat log processing the back log cruising on the net just hit the gas dog

5.

terminal 03:07

terminal green on black the cursor flash cd slash enter for a chance to win im breaking in first push a SYN flood im paul rudd - im nude tayne im saul good(man) - im loose change im boss boy - im bruce springs(tein) terminal this octothorpe on that sudo stay thirsty for my voodoo ‘piled ADM and that w00w00 my screen shelled machine swell chain hashes ASIC i 10 print shit BASIC with these 8 sticks of raised fit random access memory (memory) be scared of me (of me) prepare to be wooed by the dudes sincerity this parity in my RAID keep data flowing unscathed them stylesheets all in my page keep me so lit on the stage that wrist roll in eclipse though smooth as i move bits breaux you xamarin you sharp boy see sharpness and thats art boy fetching bytes - a black lab your soundtrack in that hack lab lock and load that top node then stop and drop that opcode terminal i pen test invested in zero day by my folks break em open like yolks scramble rot13 release that work in a zine make install and make clean cursor flash on black and glow green terminal spamming cooked thats burnt meat sniffing hooks with burp suite middle man and ill get em man when they using after free alzheimers on me yea they losing memory when im all up into their heap terminal

6.

computer crime 03:36

internet relay - chat i got a load of MSR dumps to offload - stat i just hope there aint no rats up in the channel cuz we aint need another lulzsec scandal peep the gandalf wizardry ghosting on the interknee bnc bouncing up my signal through a pringles cantenna aint nobody run this spam betta than the godfather - globe trotting baud dada don data don data don draper of this internet paper still killing cold capers got your neighbors wireless up in a tizzy cuz i planted little trojans up in every major city what you think i do on tour? rap dont pay the bills im chaotic neutral swag with computer hacking skills so check the stripes up on the jacket and pay respects to the malformed SYN packet we meddle in mcgirt - online im a filthy lil hacker but i still shine got an army on the grind check the stamp on the time put your clicking finger up if you represent computer crime linkedin eharmony databases stored up on the cloud in a bunch of different places for all the homies who in my good graces download away aint nobody gonna trace us we in the majors using burners since the days of the two way pagers cop an anonymous server and do some digital murder so we can bender up the law will you please insert girder im a nerd who gets it in cause i was born in the bitstream manipulate the internet with all of my bit schemes these bit dreams from the crt to the flip screen i hit greens and listen to the words on my hit themes soundtrack for the hackers on my downline verify a list d3 during downtime is that a legendary red off the rack? gonna hit the auction house and sell it for a hundred mil flat

7.

pinot noir superstar 02:27

i aint no savage when im up in the club im above average gotta spend some cabbage top scientist like dave miscavige i dont drink whiskey vodka beer no im not thrifty my tastes are tad refined sophisticated so i drink wine see im an artist pinky extend the farthest when i got some wine to sip on khaki slacks to match my clip on tie yea im so classy pour me another glass g have a jager bomb man that shits nasty yall clear a little path see im a pinot noir superstar (superstar) im the classiest alcoholic at the bar (at the bar) got a ponytail and a hybrid car (hybrid car) and a hand rolled cuban cigar (cigar) grab my glass at the stem then swirl it bitch we getting drunk off the merlot gotta find a suitable pairing pepperjack with the sauvignon blanc im so daring im only two bottles down and my corkscrew fiending to open another round holler at a broad on my cell say she coming through for some zinfandel drinking fermented grapes has caused a few mistakes but omelettes need eggs to break if i dont have wine then i cant create so tonight i remain a trooper in the morning rap game bradley cooper classy rap game guy from looper rap game drunken stupor ya heard

8.

one way love 04:24

is our chemistry fizzling? are you getting distant? because i feel like this relationship is getting like prison im giving - everything that i possibly could or can im trying to show you that i love you that i am a good man the bestest ever - everytime that i lock it down and endeavor to demonstrate that i make the mate that you want up in your corner it seems you wanna make it harder every step of the way say you just needing a bite but then you take the buffet no longer reach for my hand im always fishing for yours whenever youre fishing for compliments i will find you the words still got these bees and the birds wrapped all up deep in your curves butterflies up in my tummy dumbly put a crease in my nerves but it occurs to me that i do none of the same to the vision that you have of me and i think im to blame so i turn up the flame double down and maintain because as long as one of us is loving its all in the game everything you need i give you but dont receive back and now im in the breeze in the wind another victim of the one way love i got this - cup - filled to the top with emotional potion and every time you take a sip i notice something is broken i cant help but notice that your focus is off you stay a million miles away after ive broken you off cant - put my finger on it - but somethings amiss the way that you used to clutch my shoulders when i went in for a kiss the way that you ran your fingers through my hair like a comb and the way that youd sing my name when you would answer the phone i feel alone - i cant ignore anymore and ive confirmed my suspicions but every day im still wishing that this phase will just pass and its back to the fast love ignite that old school passion that we had in the past, love but thats love - sometimes you give and you take sometimes you bending over backwards so much that you break i cant - be the only one forgiving mistakes cause id rather have you give me nothing than something this fake everything you need i give you but dont receive back and now im in the breeze in the wind another victim of the one way love

9.

second base appeal 04:23

like most things in my life - i met her on the internet i was still finding myself not quite centered yet nerd in a sweater get ladies on the regulet better yet - she aint know my game or the yella vette i just a teen with the hormones raging she a pretty girl seemed prime for the occasion hit her with the request chat at her behest bout her favorite color and how i am the leetest all the sudden saw my nights turn sleepless late night instant messaging trading secrets talking bout the feelings in the past we mightve repressed bout our families and dreams dislikes and what we detest tired in the morning and my boy is asking "why you yawning?" dont wanna tell him i was dreaming all night with a girl from the internet hinging on her pink font moment she emoted i knew she was everything i want yea i know were a long long way from home plate and i cant stop thinking bout the way that she make me feel but no matter how long this girl make me wait it dont matter cause she got that second base appeal learned a couple sweet tricks twisted a balloon in the shape of a heart took a picture in my room made her laugh - she sent me a picture in a santa hat told her i would see her for the holidays and handle that she let out a little giggle told me she was shy but she sure would like to meet me i seemed like a nice enough guy asked "would you be nervous - if you met up with my friends? at a basketball game at my school?" "that depends - are your buddies cool with a dirty nerdy dropout breaking all the rules?" (hell yea) so i got her address got up off the mattress this was back in 1999 so i mapquest printed out directions marked up all the exits went up to the jewelry store and bought her up a necklace told her i would see her and i hope her expectation met reality as soon i as stepped out my whip and gazed in to her eyes yea i know were a long long way from home plate and i cant stop thinking bout the way that she make me feel but no matter how long this girl make me wait it dont matter cause she got that second base appeal well it did - and she was all i hoped for made me feel all full of warm and fuzzies like a coat store so i wrote more - every time i was away from her i felt i moped more so i had to cope more burning gas racking up the mileage every meeting just to put a little sweet in after school and on the weekend holding hands going HAM at the movies and the pink shop take her up to party city buy her up a ring pop she a little innocent parents old fashioned i wont jump the gun on a night of rushed passion got the world in a kiss solar system in a stare and a galaxy of feelings swirling in the air two of us a pair in twitterpation and its only getting better every second that were waiting no debating going on gonna take this girl to prom and i can do the rest later paris or milan yea i know were a long long way from home plate and i cant stop thinking bout the way that she make me feel but no matter how long this girl make me wait it dont matter cause she got that second base appeal i know were a long long way from home plate and i cant stop thinking bout the way that she make me feel but no matter how long this girl make me wait it dont matter cause she got that second base appeal

10.

struck 02:44

spot her in the corner she was looking kind of lonely sipping a corona i could be her good time donor as long as i can ace the broads male owner when i say that i mean it nicely cuz aint a player in the game own wisely greet her out in public then i spit a pair of couplets flying off the cuff fuck the dumb shit can you keep a secret? we can do this quietly please believe it i need it my vespene gas depleted i deeed it i need my porter greeted im egregious dirty on the airwaves regis who wanna be a millionaire win the penis deem this relationship im the keenest commander keep my ship the cleanest what if so and so find out? then neither of us doing our job and thats tragic sadly im a bit of an addict of running all around and playing in traffic doing bad shit out of habit aint nobody else gotta know how we living im dipping my pen in invisible ink and dippin pen 15 in the pink - we on sync? then she gave me her number told her she could be my lightning i could be her thunder tear her whole world asunder when she cum first then im banging loud i wonder how bad do you want the lumber? the cue cum cumber - dumb or dumber? succumbed to the game that i layed on thick and right then and there she suck my dick (true story) phones already ringing off the hook and its only been a day since i castled my rook checkmated her mate with the kung fu classic datsik southpaw nerdy magic little tragic but im jaded everytime i get a bit faded im hated cuz i play it loose and fast on all the girls who would dare give a piece of ass set a little rendezvous ima trash that shit like the economy boo treat it so wrong that her husband feel a disturbance in the force when im holding her heels and thats how you do it correct i got game thats all women respect spit a couple lines on to kissing her neck and get her thang all nice and wet yea it might be evil but the universe gave me this dick for the people so i could be a dick in the sequel after my hearts broken bitch we equal pay it forward like haley joel i gotta play this role til i fill the hole up in my heart bitch and youre heartless but im no better just another mad artist sorry you got victimized but i aint gonna lie - your wifes hot and if a girl get jumpy and cheat on me then you can call a kettle black from the pot and get caught in the meantime earn my stripes i got your broad for the night - alright? im only looking out for me and mine so kick a rock one time for your mind and get struck

11.

that kid 02:53

fucking lost them but the song is pretty much about how everyone's lives are the same no matter what they're doing

12.

supernova swag 03:40

our existence teeters on an event horizon on a one way trip to spaghettification i'm a nation builder but i'm ahead of my time watching tears well up like the gravity wells watch me shine watch me get sucked under with every little blunder beat em to the finish like a photon voltron assemble nimble tidbits broadcast subspace frequency quintessential lyrically say quasar pulsar stardust material made up of the same from the cores we ethereal space royalty imperial born from a nebula never a question man you can't explain that cuz the tides still move in these vinyl grooves and the digital alternative go solid state and innately we all remain stately ambassadors to a cluster of nerves in our brains from a cluster of stars in a universe spinning on a little blue dot filled with little men and women where everyone is sinning and salvation is a concept that they taught us out of what they deemed as love but really wasn't you're my cousin made of atoms only difference is the data not the money not errata scattered all throughout the planet shit i had it with the falsehoods none of us are truly greater if you want it sugar coated you can suck a now and later i wont even waste the oxygen to reload on this verse because every breath i'm taking on the planet make it worse but fuck it - we got the supernova swag if the universe is ending lets just end it with a bang and there aint no sense in whining cuz the entropy is rising and youre dying every second that you're wasting quit your crying fuck it - we got the supernova swag if the universe is ending lets just end it with a bang and there aint no sense in whining cuz the entropy is rising and youre dying every second that you're wasting quit your crying fuck what you heard cuz im 99%in yea i make a lot of money but i do a lot of spending trying to keep up with the joneses try to keep it swagalicous got a daughter got a girlfriend got an ex i called her missus see the bitch is nerdy soldiers are just trying to make a living but they outsourced all positions overseas and made a killing now im feeling that my people starving - i try to put em on seedy side of internets is always needing pokemon always getting master balls - the only numbers that are missing are the ones who aint up hacking all the gibsons in the kitchen fucking cooking making proggies spreading viral steady burning down the system like its molten front or hyjal in denial - watched you spread them flyers and occupied the streets teach the banks a lesson or its curtains for the currencies screw it grab a weapon grab a hammer grab a heavy chair id say id meet you down in hell but it seems were already there (but it seems were already there) and if im dying - im going crispy as a lays im gon walk up to the devil tell him bring back billy mays snort a mound of coke and shout with the ultimate pitch maaaaan mighty whitey like the putty shouting "eat the rich" damn jack move - office space ya bank accounts bare old money heads on pikes in the center times square fuck a drum circle man peace and love just forget it jolly roger told us anarchys the only way to get it

13.

nop slide to the address stretch your system like spandex with the spamtec bandits ima heap spray RAM like a canvas fucking with them root transits i got my caps on gay and itunes on the coldplay meepsheep with the 0day gn double a ok dongforce; smoke blunts in a broquet irssi best client scroll a macro real giant sitting in the channel getting mad defiant im the man with that can spam compliant i got that tommy wiseau director of the room when i spit flow saying weev should be chillin in gitmo cuz the mans afraid of gay nays when they raise the crypto i speak your language cuz ive tangled with the dangers a computer security ranger lamb of spam from the manger straight sql exchanger shake your hand with a bad cert when im sitting on your network rocking threads like a sweatshirt if you aint play whats your bet worth? in the game i claim internet birth strawberry cough in the vessel pebble watch with the steel bezel swat snitches with that next level method on the phone system with that kext metal break tumblr with a cross site scripting stop you short like cal ripken bitches be tripping my if() then style is so uplifting so get them albums and get to listening american telephone telegraph took a bath dropped a bot on their environment path got a password sniffer tactics a hat trick three different ways to own phones with magic with this piece of plastic i hack shit blaze these aids with mo flows and cat shit toxoplasmosis on the gadgets parasite my righteous habits do my damage mayor of bantown and who love scarves like jackson brown? i got it down - cool my CPU let it drown in the fluid - lead me right to it who else goin do it? vap0rs MIA and the other internet nerds wont say they just set their status away and dodge it hit replay on the hobbit internet comment cuz its easier than preaching the vomit spit shit like i was huffing jenkem commander outrank em jay said to watch the kingdom already #antisecced and linked them so i gotta load up LFN and out think them the big drum beats crash like mt gox and the government seize and freeze people get their assets locked with a no knock warrant to your mining spot gangnet bitches represent the fuck you got

14.

hacker wars (v2.0) 02:55

we run the gamut - freedom fighters griefers bandits hackers spammers phreakers gambit just how far back they can ram it some do damage from the pulpit claim they lead and theyre the culprit others do it from the shadows switching handles when convenient secret treatment question our agenda troll or internet defender? tango down a packet sender going on a ddos bender who intend to take a stand drawing lines in the sand in them silicon wafers and them fiberoptic cables trace enabled pick a side - more than two no black and white shades of gray its more like 50 kinky gifted play the system swiftly moving in and out and under groups to keep it undercover governments then wonder how to follow em like thunder so agents of the state coordinate attacks against their own and other teams compete against each other trying to take the throne motivations differ so the victory conditions shift battleground: the internet - fighting with our fingertips hacker wars - were engaged in a bit of them hacker wars (hacker wars) hacker wars - conflicting over broadband and data stores (hacker wars) hacker wars - were engaged in a bit of them hacker wars (hacker wars) hacker wars - the stakes are high and its a crime just to play on the course old spaghetti western good bad ugly pick your poison and each one makes their noise in different ways so let them boys in every system every outlet every avenue of avarice the mavericks of information face off with the candidates and cameras are there to document the struggle live in person take a peek behind the curtain situations worse than anything the casuals and NPCs could dream of cause this team of brilliant bastards go on tearing the whole scene up journalists in media dont buy what they are feeding ya depleting ya of truth because of influential groups they dont wanna lose their access so they dont care what the facts is let alone reporting pieces they dont preach nor do they practice let the hackers be the source of breaking news by breaking in to every system every outlet let me say it once again so those hackers with the badges keep their jobs and stay employed on that hacker war perpetual deep into the void

15.

open your eyes 02:37

consumer culture got em hitting the block like mario hitting a brick with his fist and kicking it off envy and sloth a monopoly toppling idiocracy prophecy got em speaking the gobbledygook cause people currently are currency addicts and cryptonumismatists steady collecting coin for the kill acrobatics of the market flipping like phones gotta make your bones spitting frequently frequency tones green hill zone and im sonic assaulting title exhalted im blowing out the avenue baltic observations of the datasets embracing the future of science fueled by my diet of knowledge and cryptoalliance gotta buy this bias cuz im blessed with the touch of midas im the flyest motherfucking johnny unitas im so pious Almighty Spam God behind us got the finest in the universe right here for your highness cept minus a dynasty guidance a counselor cometh try to school a generation when im hitting affiliate summits in your city i bump it i forrest gump it got the function running on the puter while(1) accomplish put that on pocahontas cursor arrow to bow officers up on my bridge all yellin "make it so" got the grape dro in the cannon mad culture like dannon hacking phreaking spamming on a quest to make the beating of the forces of evil illegal they codified a little glass steagall prohibition on that chivas regal had all the gangsters in the past going bugsy siegel now people betting on the liberty eagle but its a feeble attempt cuz them dollars were spent in advance in any event on "defence" all bets are off in the market of medals except uranium cuz nukes are always on a leaders cranium false flag say "they were gonna bomb a stadium" in 80 some days and how much they deserve praise for stopping a catastrophic problem they causing themselves imprison citizens the number one mission prevails whistleblowers you can pack up your whistles because a fiscal criminal the one who avoid the missles for shizzle you fuck with snowden and the systems broken they got a racket running like a second us open every college student idealistic about the change they can affect up on the world with their business but the truth is they got a product that was sold to em sloppily now theyre sitting under a mountain of debt they state property this monopoly money they printing is only getting worse and we twice bitten so now the fitting thing to do would be to start a revolution fire up the troops son you know what to do son got a lot of ways to wage war against these weapons of destruction that we paid for yea they make more using slave labor building all them gadgets for your neighbor so itll take more than just a bunch of people standing in city park waving signs and yelling at the bankers from morning till dark i aint advocating violence but im bucking compliance because requirements of a patriot include defiance

16.

i gotta 03:54

sometimes im off the deep end i go a little ham if im dark science on the week end see i got a disorder im bipolar so i fix it by puffin on weed and i need a sip of rum and cola to calm my nerves or ill get panic attacks and i got stacks of papers from them insurance cats who say "bitch you crazy you should be instituted you need to get up off the streets before you snap and you lose it" man keep them bottles out of my hand or ill be pissing on the stage like a fireman yea watch your heads i act a fool when im brain dead i done took so many drugs that the game bled i gotta stop cuz i figure that its killing me but when im manic i go hard and lack humility bitch im immortal hit the hole like a game of portal come out the other side blasting with my wartortle i gotta chill i gotta focus man i gotta pull it together i gotta do it for my people on the net making cheddar i gotta do it for my daughter gotta keep it afloat i gotta do it with these rhymes i wrote man this reckless disposition got these girls on my jock so much it makes my first reaction just to whip out my cock and make a first world problem because accidents will happen even when you got a condom im scumbag dave im the most depraved knave this side of the internet bitch i am the most brave man i might be ron paul sagan doctor gynecologist for all the freunlavens maybe im just spraying jking making light of the situa or maybe since i never copped a disease i give a fuck about what haters say but it aint healthy cuz these broads be the death of music they steady killing all my brain cells im bout to lose it a bad distraction from the shit i should be doing now instead of listenin to all these fucking chickens howl man fuh real i gotta focus man i gotta pull it together i gotta do it for my people on the net making cheddar i gotta do it for my daughter gotta keep it afloat i gotta do it with these rhymes i wrote been through the hustle many years man im fierce in the game and ive accomplished ive achieved got my legions of fans i got them nerds understand man but i want more i want them whodis from the block to grab and pass on the torch i got them bitches on the bully tip they give my people problems up in school and shit that mad lip i gotta get big so they notice us man can do it harvard style like the POTUS does the code is us and if them busters try to jack me i got an army of them boys thatll stampede right out the gates i got them broads wearing cosplay im a full fledged talent i got polymath skills call me broadway on this lil blue planet god damnit man yall gotta shuffle with my tempo gotta represent the knocking that i stand for im a nerd life soldier go commando i gotta focus man i gotta pull it together i gotta do it for my people on the net making cheddar i gotta do it for my daughter gotta keep it afloat i gotta do it with these rhymes i wrote
